LanguageData.TheMultiverseMod_Description: The Multiverse Mod brings together races, factions, items, and lore from multiple beloved franchises into RimWorld. Featuring a custom alien race framework, advanced graphics support, and seamless integration, this mod delivers a unique cross-universe experience.
LanguageData.Imperial_Description: A disciplined citizen of the Cyrodilic Empire, known for diplomatic skill and martial prowess.
LanguageData.HalfImperial_Description: A person of mixed Imperial heritage, retaining some Imperial traits and abilities.
LanguageData.ImperialLegion_Description: The disciplined military force of the Empire.
LanguageData.ImperialNobles_Description: The aristocratic families of the Empire.
LanguageData.NibeneseSyndicates_Description: Sophisticated merchant guilds of eastern Cyrodiil.
